    • changeIndex

      public int changeIndex​(Student student, java.lang.String oldIndex, java.lang.String newIndex) throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException, java.io.FileNotFoundException
      Change index number of REGISTERED course for student
      Parameters:
      student - The student (current user) information
      oldIndex - The course index that the student wants to change
      newIndex - The course index that the student wants to change to
      Returns:
      int to indicate specific error or success
      Throws:
      java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - Throws if the class is not found
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - Throws if the file is not found

    • swapIndex

      public int swapIndex​(Student student1, java.lang.String student1Index, Student student2, java.lang.String student2Index, java.lang.String student2user, java.lang.String student2pw)
      Swap index number with another peer
      Parameters:
      student1 - The student (current user) information
      student1Index - The course index that the student wants to change
      student2 - The peer information that the student wants to swap with
      student2Index - The course index that the student wants to change to
      student2user - The peer username
      student2pw - The peer password
      Returns:
      int to indicate specific error or success
